Text:
tar is a compression technology used to create a Tape ARchive. The resulting file is known as a tarball.

If you have Window, this is the same as a Zip file. You use winzip to compress and uncompress .zip files.So its the same idea.

BTW  Great torrent a million thanx :)
There is a program you can download as a shareware, its called wintar which you can use to umcompress .tar files in microsoft windows XP or vista.
You can also use a free open source program called p7zip. its also called just 7zip. Then to read the comix, get yourself a comic book reader. For linux I use Comix, it works great.
use p7zip to open the archive, then use a free comic book reader such as Comix to read the .cbr files. (comic book files)
Works great on Mac - Downloaded Comical (reader), thanks!
yeah, i guess that this one is only chapters 1-95 for those of you that care. Ill be uploading a new set as soon as i get the new ones.
Anyone know of a good reader to use on an android tablet? thanks much for the upload too, it rocks!
